column4: I   bought an iPod 5th Gen for my daughter a while ago and now she is using the main computer with linux.  Rhythmbox sync's fine with my 80G Classic.  I sync'ed with hers and it looked like it was working but after disconnect there was no music on the iPod.
that happend to a friend of mine.. he was able to restore the songs on the ipod
I am trying to sync some playlists she created on computer to her iPod
did it put the playlists only and remove her files?
